sentences.en: At operation, massive small bowel infarction due to volvulus was found.
sentences.cn: 手术时发现大量小肠由于扭转而坏死.

sentences.en: Bacteria in stagnant bowel consume dietery vitamin B 12.
sentences.cn: 滞留在肠道的内细菌还消耗食物中的维生素B12.

sentences.en: Bowel may herniate alongside a drain, with resulting obstruction.
sentences.cn: 肠管可能沿着引流物疝出, 导致梗阻.

sentences.en: Bowel or omentum may herniate alongside the drain.
sentences.cn: 肠管或网膜可能沿引流物疝出.

sentences.en: He submerged the cups in the bowel.
sentences.cn: 他把杯子都放在了水盆之中.

sentences.en: Irritable bowel syndrome seems to affect more women than men.
sentences.cn: 女性比男性更易患肠易激综合征。

sentences.en: Neostigmine augments the motor activity of the small and large bowel.
sentences.cn: 新斯的明增强小肠和大肠的运动功能.

sentences.en: Occasionally a very large part of the small bowel must be resected.
sentences.cn: 偶尔,极大部分的小肠必须切除.

sentences.en: Research shows that a high-fibre diet may protect you from bowel cancer.
sentences.cn: 研究表明高纤维饮食可预防肠癌。

sentences.en: Small bowel intussuception may require resection.
sentences.cn: 小肠肠套叠需做肠切除术.

sentences.en: The boy was suffering from a bowel obstruction and he died.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩因患肠梗阻死去了。

sentences.en: The broadbased attachment of the mesenteric root stabilizes the small bowel.
sentences.cn: 肠系膜根部基底宽阔的附着面使小肠得以稳定.

sentences.en: The diseased bowel is, as a rule, sharply delimited.
sentences.cn: 病变肠道一般有很明显界限.
